articles.description: Build-up to FA Cup third round, latest transfer updates and Graham Potter takes over as West Ham manager.

articles.description: Lucas Bergvall scored a late winner for Tottenham against Liverpool in the Carabao Cup semi-final first leg, but there was controversy over whether he should have been on the pitch.

articles.description: Pat Cummins will miss the tour of Sri Lanka for the birth of his second child, with Steve Smith leading the side in his absence.
articles.title: Steve Smith to lead Australia in three-match Test tour of Sri Lanka

articles.description: Great Britain and Ireland captain Justin Rose says speculation over Tom McKibbin's future has not been an issue before this week's Team Cup.
articles.title: LIV Golf: Tom McKibbin future is not affecting GB&I - Justin Rose

articles.description: Britain's Jacob Fearnley is set to face Nick Kyrgios - and a partisan home crowd - in the controversial Australian's return to Grand Slam tennis.

articles.description: West Ham appoint former Brighton and Chelsea boss Graham Potter as their new manager.

articles.description: England suffer a blow to their women's Ashes preparation as the only warm-up match is abandoned because of rain.

articles.description: Tottenham's trio of young stars give Postecoglou the perfect tonic with Carabao Cup semi-final win against Liverpool.
articles.title: Tottenham 1-0 Liverpool: Lucas Bergvall headline act as young Spurs show remarkable maturity
